text:
In case you didn’t know, John Stamos (of Full House fame) and his new wife Caitlin McHugh are really, really obsessed with all things Disney.

In fact, the pair, who had been dating for two years, got engaged at Disneyland in October. There, Stamos staged an elaborate engagement event for his then-girlfriend, including a short compilation of their favorite Disney films. It all ended with "The Little Mermaid" and the caption “just ask the girl.” Of course, Stamos did. On Instagram McHugh posted, “I kissed the boy and said . . . yes!”

“She loves Disneyland and [at the park], I got on my knee and asked her,” Stamos told PEOPLE of their engagement. “I pulled the ring out. I don’t know how she did it, but she went to hug me and slipped her finger right in it. When the park closed, we ran around the park in our Disney onesies.”

Since that day the two went on to get hitched in a gorgeous ceremony at the Little Brown Church in Studio City, California, then partied the night away at their home.

Now, just a week into their marriage, they are celebrating again at the Happiest Place on Earth.

As McHugh’s Instagram shows, the pair has been spending plenty of time at Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando, Florida. While there they’ve even been spotted wearing matching mouse ears, though hers were a bit more spectacular as they came with a bridal veil.

McHugh shared even more of their journey through the park, where they stopped in at shops to look at tiny baby trinkets since they are expecting their first child this spring.

On his page Stamos shared his own adorable image of the pair as they smooched near the castle joking of their one-week anniversary, “and they said it wouldn’t last.”

While this may be their last trip to the park before the baby’s arrival, odds are their upcoming bundle of joy will be a Disney baby, whether he or she likes it or not.
title: John Stamos and Caitlin McHugh Are Honeymooning at Disney World
